title: Disney to Google: Stop Training Your AI on Moana, Frozen, Other Copyrighted Works
description: Disney says it has been raising its concerns with Google for months, but the latter 'has refused to implement any technological measures to mitigate or prevent copyright infringement.'

title: Cut Through The Hype: 3 Things To Know Before Adopting Agentic AI
description: “Agentic AI” is the next solution to help fix what healthcare has been focused on for years – connecting patients to care easily and efficiently, while reducing staff burden.The post Cut Through The Hype: 3 Things To Know Before Adopting Agentic AI appeared first on MedCity News.

title: AI is powering Trump’s economy, but American voters are getting worried
description: In both political parties there’s a sense that more thought-out AI strategies will be needed. One Trump adviser calls AI a “political football.”

title: India's Data Centre Capacity Hits 1,280 MW, Set to 5X by 2030 Amid AI Boom
description: India's cloud data centre capacity stands at 1,280 MW, powering banking, power, and public infrastructure, with projections for 4-5 times growth by 2030 driven by digitalization and AI adoption.

title: Market Turbulence: AI Stocks Drop Amid Rising Treasury Yields
description: Wall Streets major indices saw a downturn on Friday as investors exited technology stocks amidst growing concerns over an AI bubble and the impact of rising US Treasury yields This unease was exacerbated after a faction of Federal Reserve officials criticized easing monetary policies
